item.title: Installing a Network Rack in My House
item.description: After about a month of work I’ve finally finished installing my new network, all contained in an actual network rack. If you want to see what my network was like before this, here is the post Here is a quick before and after: (Router and modem are upstairs. I have cable that runs directly to the switch here.) (I’ve moved the router down here, while the modem stays upstairs, since that is where the source is.
